name: Touchscreen
description:
Touchscreen is a block blob-pushing game borne out of my own personal frustration with touchscreen controls and a desire to share that pain with others by transforming it into puzzles. There are 30 puzzles in all, in 5 groups of 6.

Alternate Link: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=3edf2fbd8aa0b16a4fd9878af66af838

Made with increpare's PuzzleScript engine using Draknek's level select code. A few sprites and two levels are adapted from D. Skinner's Microban.
